rows.label: tev045501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev045501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Liana about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev045501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev045501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Liana if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev045501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Liana about casualties during the attack.

rows.label: tev045501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Liana about the attack.

rows.label: tev045501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Liana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045501_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Liana what she will do next.

rows.label: tev045501_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Liana about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0001
rows.name: Ma-non ship is fascinating![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0002
rows.name:
See? Look at strangely shaped boxes.
They hold much cargo for their size,
yet float as if empty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0003
rows.name: Ma-non can move them around ship with ease.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Now I see why Ganglion want Ma-non technology.
It can work miracles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0009
rows.name:
My brother Nemard is hopelessly weak.
He must be stronger to be called true Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0010
rows.name:
When we beamed onto ship, he mewled like child.
Cried about how his body might vanish forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0011
rows.name: I thought I would die of shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Grandfather must be so worried that his heir is flimsy
like twig...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Ma-non ship kept us safe from Ganglion fire.
No one was hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0018
rows.name:
Situation was much worse when Cavern Clan attacked
our village.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0019
rows.name: They slaughtered us with Ganglion weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Those they did not kill were drugged and taken here
as slaves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0021
rows.name:
We are grateful that you chased Ganglion away.
None should have to suffer as we did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0026
rows.name:
Ganglion rallied their most elite forces for attack
on Earth city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0027
rows.name:
But Cavern Clan not elite. They were grunts.
Ganglion did not include them in main force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0028
rows.name: Bah. Typical Cavern Clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG0029
rows.name:
They boasted of being proud Ganglion warriors.
But they were only glorified meat shields.
Just too stupid to know it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1001
rows.name: My brother and Heptana always hunt these days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1002
rows.name:
His hunting skills are much better now.
It is night and day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1003
rows.name: It is almost as if marriage made him better Prone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1004
rows.name:
Only one way to know if marriage has such power...
I must also find mate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1009
rows.name:
I know every secret of this ship now.
I need something new.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1010
rows.name:
Since my brother is married now,
maybe I will go join BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1011
rows.name: I hear they let non-Earth-aliens join now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG1012
rows.name:
If they can do it, so can I. I will become Curator!
Scour all of Mira for rare and wonderful things![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG2001
rows.name:
My brother trains without pause these days.
He seeks to keep Enneana safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG2002
rows.name: He gets stronger day by day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG2003
rows.name: It is almost as if marriage made him better Prone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG2004
rows.name:
Only one way to know if marriage has such power...
I must also find mate![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG3001
rows.name:
I promised Grandfather we would explore Mira
together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG3002
rows.name: I never got to keep promise...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG3003
rows.name:
But I know he is out there.
He is reborn as proud beast of Oblivia![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG3004
rows.name:
He can go where he pleases. Eat what he pleases.
It is grand life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045501_MSG3005
rows.name: Thank you for returning his flesh to Miran beasts.[ST:wait ]
